display_long_description:
Step into the action with the official Premier League VR game, and experience soccer like never before. 

Choose your favorite club, wear the official kit, and walk out into iconic stadiums. Whether you’re making game-winning saves, scoring screamers, or reliving the Premier League’s biggest moments, this is your chance to play your part.
[media]

# Moments
Matchweek Moments is your weekly DLC drop of highlights that mirror the real Premier League soccer games,  recreate the 2023/24 season’s best goals and saves, putting yourself in the exact position of top Premier League stars. 
[media]

# Shot Stopper
Test your reflexes as a goalkeeper against real Premier League goals.
[media]

# Headers
Perfect your timing across 30 fast-paced levels that push your precision to the limit.
[media]

# Free Play
Sharpen your skills solo or with friends in Free Play, or go head-to-head in Multiplayer to climb the leaderboards.
[media]

# Sanctuary
Explore your own Player Sanctuary, where you can unlock and collect Premier League Soccer player cards and statues to show off.
[media]

# Customize
Customize your avatar with club kits, name, number, and boots—or unlock your favorite team and play as iconic Premier League players.

# Get closer to the Premier League than ever before.
